Pet Services¶

Models¶

class petservices.models.OnWalkNote(*args, **kwargs)¶

Tracking for notifications which happen during a walk

Parameters:
  • id (AutoField) – Id
  • notification_type (CharField) – Notification type
  • time (DateTimeField) – Time
  • note (TextField) – Note
  • pet_walk_id (ForeignKey to PetWalk) – Pet walk
class petservices.models.PackWalk(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model to allow a walker to assoicate multiple pet walks. e.g. Taking a group of dogs out for a walk or to the dog park.

This can also only have one associate pet walk.

Parameters:
  • id (AutoField) – Id
  • description (CharField) – Description
  • walked_by_id (ForeignKey to WalkerProfile) – Walked by
class petservices.models.PetWalk(*args, **kwargs)¶

Model used to track walk specific information for a single pet, in addition to the association between a pet, an owner’s feedback and the walker (via the PackWalk)

Parameters:
  • id (AutoField) – Id
  • pet_id (ForeignKey to Pet) – Pet
  • pack_walk_id (ForeignKey to PackWalk) – Pack walk
  • satisfaction (CharField) – Satisfaction
  • owners_notes (TextField) – Owners notes
  • walkers_notes (TextField) – Walkers notes
  • pickup_lon (FloatField) – Pickup lon
  • pickup_lat (FloatField) – Pickup lat
  • end_lon (FloatField) – End lon
  • end_lat (FloatField) – End lat
  • start_datetime (DateTimeField) – Start datetime
  • end_datetime (DateTimeField) – End datetime
  • feedback_by_id (ForeignKey to OwnerProfile) – Feedback by
